channel.title: Pipewire on Das Blog

item.title: Distro hopping and Pipewire annoyances
item.description:
Distro hopping.

First off. I’ve switched to Fedora 38 now, lets see how long it will last. I wouldn’t be surprised if I’m back to Debian or Kali in a really near future :-).

Pipewire annoyances.

For as long as I can remember I’ve always had this issues with the sound on Linux. Random “popping”
